org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data

Class LCNChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data.LCNChannel

  • public class LCNChannel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an IP connection. Therefore it has information about the address, as well as a buffer which holds the input / output.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer
      The buffer that holds input / output.
      java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel
      The actual NIO channel.
      boolean isReconnecting
      Is true if the channel is currently reconnecting.
      java.net.InetSocketAddress remote
      The remote address of the channel.

      Constructor and Description

      Simple constructor for a LCNChannel.

      • LCNChannel

        public LCNChannel(java.net.InetSocketAddress remote,
          java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
          boolean isReconnecting,
          java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel)
        Simple constructor for a LCNChannel.
        Parameters:
        remote - The remote address.
        buffer - The underlying ByteBuffer.
        isReconnecting - a flag to show that the underlying channel is reconnecting.
        channel - The actual SocketChannel.
